message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $10000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $10000.
